page.title: 07FASHION AROUND DRUMNADROCHIT
page.content: It is probably true to say that {Drumnadrochit}follows fashion rather than creates it. Most girls buy at least one magazine which helps them keep up to date with fashion and beauty. The most{popular magazines purchased are Jackie, Patches, Blue Jeans, Smash Hits for the girls but the boys buy motorbike and car mags. Where{clothes}are concerned most people wear down to earth clothes. They don't want to wear anything to way out incase people dislike them. During the day most girls wear jeans and a jumper and trainers, but at a disco they wear mini skirts or baggy trousers and a top. Most girls like to wear make up when they go out at night. There is no school uniform, girls wear skirts,jumpers or tops and court shoes. Boys wear trousers and jumpers but out of school wear jeans .
